summary: A test suite that validates the Swin Transformer model implementation, checking its configuration, initialization, forward computation, output tensors, training utilities, and compatibility with multi‑GPU and gradient checkpointing, as well as task‑specific behavior for image classification and masked image modeling.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the Swin model within the library, enabling developers and users to rely on its performance for computer‑vision applications and to safely integrate it into production pipelines.
